channel.title: Need a little help getting started
channel.description:
Ok well i have little to no experience with coding and i really want to learn. Im willing to teach myself but i was wondering if anyone can maybe help me get started by kind of telling me what all i need to learn how to do coding.
P.S i want to learn to code so i can help my friend who is working on his server. It seems he could get the server working faster with a little bit of help than he could doing it alone.

item.title: Need a little help getting started
item.dc:creator: @Jax0n Jax0n
item.description:
@Jax0n wrote:

ill take all the help i can get on this tbh. I dont have msn because it seems to slow my computer down pretty bad.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2009, 12:06:29 pm[/size][hr]Another quick question i have is, would it be better to start with a clean source or to just edit an already existing one?

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help getting started

item.title: Need a little help getting started
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:6, topic:316804”][quote author=lord dharok link=topic=413374.msg3044594#msg3044594 date=1259375472]
i can give u lessons if u ever want them im a good coder im in the middle of my own server with my little bro i taught him and hes awesome mad skill
[/quote]

Yes your mad with java skills; but you need help making a teleport home command.[/quote]
LOLD IRL!!

Read full topic
